N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 112.7 - Noncomplying transactions

State Regulations

Loss portfolio transfers executed or entered into after November 30, 1984 that do not comply with section
112.5
of this Part, shall be reported in annual and interim statements, filed in New York, so that the consideration paid by the transferer for any such transaction shall be recorded as a deposit and reported as a nonadmitted asset in exhibit 1 of the annual and interim statements, with no deduction made from loss and loss adjustment expense reserves.
